sentences.en: He's heavily reliant on bank loans.
Her disposition was vivacious, and she liked this self - reliant , self - sufficient , straight spoken boy.
sentences.cn: 她的性格很活泼, 她喜欢这个独立自主 、 自命不凡 、 说话直爽的男孩子.

sentences.en: However, China does not want to become reliant on importing EW systems.
sentences.cn: 然而, 中国不想依赖于进口的电子战系统.

sentences.en: It will also make Deutsche Bank less reliant on investment banking.
sentences.cn: 该交易还将减少德意志银行对投资银行业务的依赖.

sentences.en: Mila and Oa have learned to become self reliant.
Raising self - reliant children requires parents at times to lead with their heads and not their hearts.
sentences.cn: 培养有自立能力的孩子要求家长们不时地用理智而不是用感情来引导孩子.

sentences.en: She liked this self - reliant , self - sufficient , straight - spoken boy.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢这个独立自主, 自命不凡, 说话爽直的男孩.

sentences.en: She seemed so experienced and self - reliant in her tinsel helmet and military accoutrements.
sentences.cn: 她戴着金箔头盔,佩着士兵装备,看上去经验丰富,信心十足.

sentences.en: The accident left the boy severely brain-damaged and almost totally reliant on others.
sentences.cn: 那次事故使这个男孩脑部严重受损，生活几乎完全依赖别人。

sentences.en: The charity is completely reliant on public donations.
sentences.cn: 这一慈善团体完全依靠公众捐款.

sentences.en: The hostel is heavily reliant upon charity.
sentences.cn: 这家收容所在很大程度上依赖赞助。

sentences.en: These people are not wholly reliant on Western charity.
sentences.cn: 这些人并非完全依赖西方的施舍。

sentences.en: They are reliant on a very limited number of exportable products.
sentences.cn: 他们依赖数量非常有限的外销产品。

sentences.en: When it comes to changing a tire, we're fairly self - reliant.
sentences.cn: 换轮胎的时候, 人们表现得相当自立.

sentences.en: Work from grass roots, avoid idealism, and overcome reliant mind.
sentences.cn: 从基层做起, 避免理想主义, 克服依赖心理.

sentences.en: You claim the field is too reliant on the Linnaean taxonomic system.
sentences.cn: 李博士你提出学界太依赖林奈分类系统.

words.tran_cn: 信赖；信心；受信赖的人或物

trans.tran_cn: 依赖的，依靠的，信赖的，信任的
